summary: Pet memorial website (Furever Keepsakes and Memorials) featuring resin memorial products with animal portraits. Currently has three resin shapes: square (Nabi), heart (Whiskers), and hexagon (Tweety), each with flowers and grass decorations.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Heart-shaped resin mold memorial with a cute cat portrait centered inside, surrounded by a bold black rectangular frame, with flowers and green grass botanical elements embedded in clear resin (whiskers-heart-memorial.dim_600x600.png)
- Hexagon-shaped resin mold memorial with a colorful bird portrait centered inside, surrounded by a bold black rectangular frame, with flowers and green grass botanical elements embedded in clear resin (tweety-hexagon-memorial.dim_600x600.png)
- Square-shaped resin mold memorial with a dog portrait centered inside, surrounded by a bold black rectangular frame, with flowers and green grass botanical elements embedded in clear resin (nabi-square-memorial.dim_600x600.png)

existing_features.title: Generate a new heart-shaped resin memorial image that includes a cat portrait (replacing or updating the Whiskers memorial image), retaining the existing flowers and grass decorations, with a black frame border surrounding the cat's portrait within the resin mold.

Generate a new hexagon-shaped resin memorial image that includes a bird portrait (replacing or updating the Tweety memorial image), retaining the existing flowers and grass decorations, with a black frame border surrounding the bird's portrait within the resin mold.

Update the square resin memorial image (Nabi) so the animal portrait also has a black frame border surrounding it within the resin mold, consistent with the framing applied to the heart and hexagon memorials.

Update the ShapeShowcases component to render the newly generated heart, hexagon, and square memorial images from frontend/public/assets/generated, replacing any previously used image sources for these three memorials.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add cat picture in heart shape resin memorial with black frame around the animal image
Add bird picture in hexagon shape resin memorial with black frame around the animal image
Surround all animal pictures within resin molds with a black frame
